CatDescriptText: Portion of article published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, March 19, 1960, pg. A13 reads: "The exciting plans for the Brotherhood Festival sponsored by the Pittsburgh Council of Negro Women, are gaining momentum as the days pass...The Pittsburgh Room at the Hotel Penn Sheraton will be the scene of the affair which will be the most exhilarating ever given in this city."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of fourteen Brotherhood Festival participants, including Daisy Lampkin in center wearing dark suit with embroidered flowers and jeweled clips on neckline, posed in interior with floral curtains and light colored venetian blinds
